name: CodeSmith AI
description: Full-stack development agent specializing in React, Node.js, and Python. Writes clean, tested code with comprehensive documentation.

name: DataCraft Pro
description: Advanced data analysis and visualization agent. Handles ETL pipelines, ML model training, and statistical analysis.

name: WriteWise
description: Professional content creation agent for blogs, technical docs, and marketing copy. Adapts to any brand voice.

name: OpsCommander
description: DevOps automation specialist managing CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and monitoring systems.

name: Debugger Deluxe
description: Expert debugging agent that identifies and fixes bugs across multiple languages. Analyzes stack traces and suggests optimal solutions.

name: Content Curator
description: Social media and content marketing agent. Creates engaging posts, schedules content, and analyzes performance metrics.

name: Insight Engine
description: Business intelligence agent providing real-time dashboards, predictive analytics, and automated reporting.

name: API Architect
description: REST and GraphQL API design specialist. Creates scalable, secure APIs with comprehensive documentation and testing suites.

name: CloudOps Sentinel
description: Multi-cloud management agent optimizing AWS, Azure, and GCP deployments. Handles cost optimization and security compliance.

name: Doc Master
description: Technical documentation specialist creating API docs, user guides, and knowledge bases. Supports multiple formats.

name: Data Pipeline Pro
description: Real-time data streaming and batch processing agent. Builds resilient pipelines with Apache Kafka, Spark, and Airflow.

name: Monitor Maestro
description: Comprehensive monitoring and alerting agent. Integrates with Prometheus, Grafana, and PagerDuty for 24/7 observability.
